name: Hentai NetPuzzle
description:
Hentai NetPuzzle is a network construction logic game, and what you need to do is to connect all the devices to the network.

Gameplay Guide


Victory Condition: You need to connect all the devices to the network.
How to Play: Click on two cables to swap their locations.

Function Keys


Keyboard P: One key connection
Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play)
Keyboard N: Next level

Game Features


Pleasing Pictures
Soothing Music
